    • Method Detail

      • getUserById

        public User getUserById​(Long id)
        Find a user by id
        Parameters:
        id - id of the user
        Returns:
        the user or null if user not exist or current user has not right to read the user

      • getAuthenticationMethod

        public AuthMethod getAuthenticationMethod​(String identifier)
        Which authentication method and parameters should a user use to authenticate. If the identifier is an email address, it will return authMethod which match the localAccount linked with the email address. Otherwise, identifier is used as a username and the first LocalAccount of the user is used.

        In case no LocalAccount has been found, authentication method with random parameters is returned. Such parameters may be used by clients to create brand new account. This behavior prevents to easy account existence leaks.

        Parameters:
        identifier - LocalAccount email address or User username
        Returns:
        authentication method to use to authentication as email owner or new random one which can be use to create a brand new localAccount
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - badRequest if there is no identifier

      • getDefaultRandomAuthenticationMethod

        public AuthMethod getDefaultRandomAuthenticationMethod()
        Get default hash method with random salt
        Returns:
        a hash method and its parameters

      • createUser

        public User createUser​(String username,
                       String email,
                       String plainPassword)
        Create a brand new user, which can authenticate with a LocalAccount.First, plainPassword will be hashed as any client should do. Then the signup method is called.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        email - email address
        plainPassword - plain text password
        Returns:
        a brand new user
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if username is already taken

      • createAdminUserTx

        public User createAdminUserTx​(String username,
                              String email,
                              String plainPassword)
        createAdminUser within a brand new transaction.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        email - email address
        plainPassword - plain text password
        Returns:
        a brand new user

      • createAdminUser

        public User createAdminUser​(String username,
                            String email,
                            String plainPassword)
        Create a brand new admin user, which can authenticate with a LocalAccount. First, plainPassword will be hashed as any client should do. Then the signup method is called.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        email - email address
        plainPassword - plain text password
        Returns:
        a brand new user
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if username is already taken

      • signup

        public User signup​(SignUpInfo signup)
        Create a new user with local account. An e-mail will be sent to user to verify its account
        Parameters:
        signup - all info to create a new account
        Returns:
        brand new user embedding an LocalAccount
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if username is already taken

      • authenticate

        public User authenticate​(AuthInfo authInfo)
        Try to authenticate user with given token
        Parameters:
        authInfo - authentication information
        Returns:
        just authenticated user of null is authentication did not succeed
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if authentication failed

      • updatePassword

        public void updatePassword​(AuthInfo authInfo)
        Update password of the given account. The given password should be hashed by the client
        Parameters:
        authInfo - contains account identifier and new password
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if currentUser is not allowed to update the given account

      • requestPasswordReset

        public void requestPasswordReset​(String email)
        If the given email address is linked to a local account, sent a link to this mailbox to reset the account password.
        Parameters:
        email - email address used as account identifier

      • updateLocalAccountEmailAddress

        public LocalAccount updateLocalAccountEmailAddress​(LocalAccount account)
                                            throws ColabMergeException
        Update the account with values provided in given account.Only field which are editable by users will be impacted.
        Parameters:
        account - account new values
        Returns:
        updated account
        Throws:
        HttpErrorMessage - if the provided email is not a valid email
        ColabMergeException - if something went wrong

      • getCurrentUserActiveSessions

        public List<HttpSession> getCurrentUserActiveSessions()
        Get all session linked to the current user
        Returns:
        list of all active sessions
